殨字的基本解释

殨
kuì
古同“溃”，溃烂。

殨
huì
特指疮溃烂：殨脓。

殨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuì］
［《廣韻》胡對切，去隊，匣。］
肿坏；溃烂。后作“潰”。

殨字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【歹字部】　殨； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页583第18
【唐韻】【集韻】?胡對切，音潰。【說文】爛也。　又【集韻】戸賄切，音瘣。腫決也。　又【集韻】胡骨切，音搰。義同。

殨字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
殨字的起名意思

暂无。

Mourn
Basic explanation of words
Mourn
kuì
The ancient Tong "collapsed" and festered.
Mourn
huì
Specifically refers to sore ulcer: pus.
Mourn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuì］
["Guangyun" Hu cuts, goes to the team, box. ]
Swollen; ulcerated. Later it was called "Break".
Mourn
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Bad Characters] 　殨; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 583 18
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Hu cut, the sound collapsed. [Said the text] It sucks.　[Jiyun] again, bribery and cut, sound stubborn. Swollen also.　[Jiyun] Hu Guqie, Yindi. The same meaning.
